external_references.description: Microsoft. (2022, May 9). Ransomware as a service: Understanding the cybercrime gig economy and how to protect yourself. Retrieved March 10, 2023.

description: [Cinnamon Tempest](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1021) has maintained leak sites for exfiltrated data in attempt to extort victims into paying a ransom.(Citation: Microsoft Ransomware as a Service)
